description: Gather an overview of what Java is and its historical significance
Identify key features of the Java programming language and its ecosystem
Research popular Java libraries and frameworks (e.g. Spring, Hibernate)
Examine uses of Java in various industries (e.g. Android app development, enterprise software)
Investigate Java's platform independence and virtual machine concept
Investigate the latest trends and best practices in using Java for cloud-native and serverless applications.
Create a case study on the use of Java in a real-world blockchain or AI/ML project.
Develop a Java-based microservices architecture for event-driven and zero-trust cloud development
